snippet.title: UNDERCRAFT | GAME TRAILER [ENG]
snippet.description:
Codaso Studios presents a new and fascinating challenge of the dark brush style to video games.

Undercraft is a card game, a roguelike-style challenge with automatic turn-based battle, deck creation and a deep atmosphere, where each game will always be different and only victory will take you to new levels...

In Undercraft you will have the option to play four-player games, all random, and reach the highest level.

Inspect the card library and unlock the most difficult characters.

Enter an unexpected and rigorously competitive adventure.

Get it from the Microsoft Store:
https://apps.microsoft.com/store/detail/9PNTTVB72TLD
•
•
•
•
